website_summaries.verdict: The Gel Quantum 360 Knit features a seamless knit upper that afforded runners a sock-like fit and exceptional breathability. It delivers responsive and exceptional cushioning upon impact while providing strong-push offs, thanks to its signature 360 Gel Technology. While many are impressed with the quality of this shoe, there were others who felt that it is a bit heavy and narrow. Overall, it’s a good road shoe for neutral pronators who need a reliable ride for short to mid-distance runs.
pros: A lot of runners have lauded the shoe on how comfortable it is
Some testers have reported going sockless with the Quantum 360 Knit and not having any hot spots or blisters
As noted by most testers, the stretchy knit upper molded well to the foot, giving a glove-like fit
A lot of runners shared that the upper offered great ventilation
The knitted upper fabric proved to be good at keeping the feet dry during runs, commented by a consumer
Testers have stated that the cushioning material of Quantum 360 Knit delivered as promised
it did great in terms of helping protect the feet and legs from the impact generated by footfalls
Some were pleasantly surprised by the damping technology of the Gel Quantum 360 Knit, which gave them smoother strides & takeoffs
The outsole tread has been observed to provide good grip even on wet surfaces
Some claimed that the upper granted good structure on the midfoot and heel cup area, which prevented foot slippage
cons: A handful of wearers has commented on how heavy the shoe was for them
A runner had also noted that this shoe’s midsole tended to be noisy or squeaky during runs
Some testers observed that the midfoot area was a bit narrow
The mid-sole tended to be stiff and needed a break-in period, a couple of runners claimed

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable. The new fabric seems to keep my foot from slipping inside the shoe when I’m running. Only downside was the shipping was slower than expected from this seller. If your in a hurry don’t use these guys.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 pairs for my collection. These were meant to be for work (nursing job) ad they do an excellent job at saving my feet. I still cycle through my murano 25s which aint as comfortable as these, but no combo saves my feet, knees, hips and back like these. Never buying Nike, or any other brand again. BTW, for being just work shoes, I’ve never had so many compliments on these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Lisco

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair for my husband and the first shoes he asked for after wearing the first pair everywhere and for everything, day in and day out, for several years. He absolutely loves them! They are comfortable, very stable for running, cushioned so a whole day trek is actually enjoyable. He bragged about them so much that I bought a pair for me and it became my favorite pair of shoes for work (I stand at my desk most of the day), power walking, and running.
customer_reviews.author: Danuta

customer_reviews.title: My running shoe preference is the ASICS GEL-Quantum 360 & it does not disappoint
customer_reviews.text: This is my 8th pair for the ASICS product family. My first pair were Nike Airs & they irritated my achilles, so I retired them early at 375 miles, [normal retirement is 500 miles]. I prefer the Quantum 360 over the other three ASCIS brands, GT2000, GT2000 V3 & Kayano 20, 22 that I have used over the years. I have a tandem shoe strategy so I rotate the usage. The all knit top is different & they fell lighter than the prior 360 version. Let's see how they wear after 350-500 miles.
customer_reviews.author: CNL

customer_reviews.title: These shoes from 6PM are defective
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 pairs of this Asics gel-quantum 360 knit 2 with black and gray color and I absolutely love them. They are on the heavy side compare with the adidas ultraboost but they are so comfy that I wear them a lot more than the ultraboost. So I decided to buy another pair (blue in color). Mistake happened when I decided to buy from 6PM. The shoe have stain on them and the arch part of the shoe has a hollow surface as shown on the picture. These pair of shoes are probably rejected from quality control. I will return these shoes and buy another pair from a different seller. 6PM never again!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: One small problem....
customer_reviews.text: the edges of the shoe are extremely rough. I tend to clip my ankle every so often and it just tears open the skin..... Comfortable, fit as expected and so far I love the look and feel. There is no additional spring to your run, but they do feel great when I run. 3 miles regularly, 8 minutes per mile at my slowest pace.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Haack

customer_reviews.title: A Class lever i highly recommend this
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time buying an Asics brand ........ Don't know how to say this at first once you ware it for the first time you feel it's a little occurred but once you start walking you feel your walking on clouds it's super comfortable it's like it have been build specifically to you ..... to get the most out of the shoes it's a most you should get Asics socks as well i highly recommend ASICS Quick Lyte Cushion Quarter socks
customer_reviews.author: Yousuf

customer_reviews.title: Love ASICS, These Shoes Hurt My Feet
customer_reviews.text: I love ASICS shoes. I bought these as an upgrade from previous models I have worn over the course of 20 years. There is a design or manufacturing defect and a plastic ridge in the heel cups cuts deeply into the inside heels of my feet. I simply can’t wear them. I will contact the manufacturer to see if I can exchange them for another model.
customer_reviews.author: william deitrick

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my feet 90% of the time at my job, and these really take stress off my feet/lower legs/back. The indigo color also looks awesome with my black scrubs. I had been wearing Nike Free RN flyknit, and loved the way it had that sock-like feel, but they were a bit narrow and didn't have any heel cup support or adequate cushioning for being on my feet all day. I twas torn between going with these and Adidas Ultraboost 20. These dropped down in price enough that I took the chance, and I'm so glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and finish, nice look
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased four of the ASICS Gel-Quantum 360 over the last several years. They fit and wear well, and important in the desert of Arizona, the knit is cool in the summer. They also don't pick up rocks in the grooves of the bottom of the shoe, which almost all shoes prior to my buying the ASICS did. The only issue, the reason for the four stars, is the heel of the insert is a bit narrow, and pinched my heel after 5 miles. I pulled the insert from an old pair, put them in my new shoes, and the pain is gone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are excellent. I have long loved the ASICS brand and these don’t disappoint. The fit is very nice and snug with the knit fabric, and the full gel sole provides excellent cushion while running. I use at the gym for treadmill and weightlifting.
customer_reviews.author: Zasquatch

customer_reviews.title: Asics Are Both Stylish and High Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Boyfriend says they feel really good—as I expected, since I loved my Asics. This is THE BRAND of athletic sneakers I’d recommend. My pair is still going strong after 4 years of near daily use. Plus this pair is a nice stylish blue that looks really good and will go with a lot of different outfits. I think we chose a really great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.author: G. Bicker

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel and cool of the knit uppers. Shoes are very comfortable and I have not worn them enough to fully break in. Shipping was before time posted
customer_reviews.author: Don Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Best shoe ever
customer_reviews.text: Best shoe I’ve ever purchased and I’ve been in the running game a long time now... also on my feet at work all day and these things are so comfortable! I bought 3 more pairs just so I don’t run out of them... totally worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: J Bartkus

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love asic 360 running shoes. I have bad feet and they are the only shoes that feel good! The only negative is the shoe strings. I have to replace them within the 1st month of purchasing the shoes. This has been an issue for several pair over several years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heaven for my feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a shoe that everytime I wear, I think to myself, “These are so damn comfortable!”. I would compare them to a memory foam pillow; a tad heavier than modern, lightweight shoes but sturdier & plush.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Tight Fit
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 13.5 and these were 14. They fit tight and the color is too bright of a blue.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Mack

customer_reviews.title: Delray Runner
customer_reviews.text: My second paid of Knit 2 Asics, because this design is the best fitting of all 360 Quantums. These are a nice solid dark grey color and as expected, are rockstar performers.
customer_reviews.author: Delray Beach Customer

customer_reviews.title: Insoles smaller than the actual shoe 🤬
customer_reviews.text: The insoles were smaller than the shoe. We have been very inconvenienced because we needed the shoe for a triathlon the day after they arrived. NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Sacha

customer_reviews.title: Just okay.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Asics. Good design, not my favorite feel while running but they're good enough to continue to train.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 8 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe with the knit. A little heavy for long runs. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great arch support
customer_reviews.text: These shoes help me with leg and back pain from my strenuous job.
customer_reviews.author: Karrie Swann

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes I have about 100 miles on them now and they where a little rough to breakin but now are great. The breakin did put some blistering on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Scott

customer_reviews.title: Comfort to spare!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoes I've ever owned. Plush with ample cushioning for urban runs. Breathable, with unique pattern and styling. Oh and $80 cheaper than Asics website.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Fit as expected and super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Reed

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoe. Good support. Great looking. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: ESfamily

customer_reviews.title: its well maybe  a bit  clingy and a tad to warm
customer_reviews.text: comfortable last size is good looks a bit like that ream of carpet no one wanted

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. Excellent shoe with super support for those with very high arches. These are the only shoes I have found that give me a comfortable fit with great wear and support.
customer_reviews.author: patrick agnew

customer_reviews.title: Great as always
customer_reviews.text: The knit fabric was nice compared to other models of this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: HN

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, just to small. I've purchased size 11 for years but this time there tight
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit with “formal” (dark blue) jeans
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for a consistent look with jeans, and I love ‘em. Super comfortable, and I intend to put them to the test on my next 5K.
customer_reviews.author: Theaterguy

customer_reviews.title: super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Probably the most comfortable shoes I own. The gel makes them sooooo soft. love these shoes. Priced a little higher than some shoes, but not more than new Nike or Adidas in stores. great pair of shoes!

customer_reviews.title: Top
customer_reviews.text: Excelent. Very confortable. It is recommended to buy a number above what you usually use. It will be even more comfortable. The sole of the shoe can be somewhat slippery when the floor is wet, or damp.
customer_reviews.author: Rui Jorge R. Moreira de Sá

customer_reviews.title: Awesome ASICS!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe for me. Only wear ASIC athletic shoes.
customer_reviews.author: T. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for nike air max replacement and shoes did not disappoint. they look great and are very comfortable. Buy these shoes if you wear your shoes 16 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, comfort, and color. I'm a nurse and on my feet for 12 hours. They are so comfortable even the first time wearing them. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Got here way faster but I thought it would and Superthey are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Mclaren

customer_reviews.title: Not worth price $$
customer_reviews.text: Great for walking, bad for running. Only two runs and my feet are already tore up. Do not recommend for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Insanely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the aesthetics of the product and the fit is dead on. These are more comfortable than i had imagined having never owned Asics before.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I work 12 hour shifts in the emergency room and for the first time in 17 years my feet and back didn’t hurt. I’m so glad I bought 2 pairs

customer_reviews.text: Love these so much, i ordered another pair..... and two more very soon. Enough said.

customer_reviews.title: They’re comfy and look awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The support and cushion are great and they’re very lightweight.

customer_reviews.text: The best running shoe and I have tried all the brands. I have been running for 17 years.

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Gel-Quantum 360 Knit 2 Men's Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This product meets my expectations for quality, price and size. I recommend this product to other buyers.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. But a little heavy

customer_reviews.title: ASICS are worth the money

customer_reviews.title: These shoes feel wonderful!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes feel wonderful, some of the best cushioning ever!

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable and stable shoes you can buy. I am on my feet all day and have no discomfort. I recommend them to everybody I know.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for being on your feet all day!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe to be on your feet 12 hours a day!

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable all-purpose running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Just about perfect for most uses. Fit like a glove, lightweight and very 'breathable'.

customer_reviews.title: narrow
customer_reviews.text: comfortable. sit well on the leg. but they are visually narrow compared to other asics. I didn’t really like it.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, support, material. Recommend it. Ordered it in size 13

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Already ran a half and 10K, plus alll the training that went with it. Good shoe and I’ll keep buying this brand.

customer_reviews.title: cool stuff
customer_reviews.text: soft with enough support,guess it would feel better with this one than nimbus after 10km.
customer_reviews.author: yuan

product_meta.title: Asics Mens Gel-Quantum 360 Knit Shoes, 7 UK, Black/Classic Red/Stone Grey
product_meta.description: Run hard, land soft. The GEL-Quantum 360 Knit shoe is constructed with 360 degrees of our GEL technology cushioning that blends high performance with maximum comfort. A new stretch knit upper surrounds the foot in a custom, sock-like fit so you can power through running and cross-training workouts. Weight: 12.6. Heel Height: 22. Forefoot Height: 12.
feature_bullets: Rearfoot and Forefoot GEL Technology Cushioning System - Attenuates shock during impact and toe-off phases, and allows movement in multiple planes as the foot transitions through the gait cycle.
Trusstic System technology - Reduces the weight of the sole unit while retaining the structural integrity of the shoe.
Heel Clutching System Technology - Exoskeletal heel counter provides improved support and creates improved heel fitting environment.

Ortholite X-40 Sockliner - This premium sockliner features higher rebound properties while providing excellent moisture management and a high-level of breathability (Ortholite is a registered trademark of ATP Manufacturing LLC.)
Solyte Midsole Material - A lighter weight midsole compound than ASICS standard EVA and SpEVA midsoles. Also features enhanced cushioning and durability.
